title: Is Unknown Command
description: Checks if the command is unknown. (Only use at on command event.)

title: Is Even Number
description: Checks if the number is even.

title: Is Inventory Full
description: Checks if the inventory is full.

title: Is MagicSpell Spell Damage
description: Checks if the damage is caused by a spell.

title: is MythicMobs Mob
description: Checks if the mob is a MythicMobs mob.

title: Is Animal
description: Checks if the entity is an animal.
